TopicTitle: I have looked all over, and if there is a Solar Sail mod I can not find it...

Articles.Content:
Has anyone attempted a Solar Sail mod?

What would be the issues for a Solar Sail mod?

Would there be interest in a Solar Sail mod?

I am a noob at Unity and KSP modding, so please don't jump all over me for my ignorance.
KSP Interstellar has a Solar Sail.
